title: The Smell of war
creator_credit: Granada Television International and Julia Spark
brief_description: A segment from the television program “History in action”, this video is aimed at an audience of junior high school students through to adults. It is an investigation of the conditions and events leading to the spark that set off World War I. Includes rare archival footage.
